thread.title: Really good hotel in Opera district
thread.title_full: Really good hotel in Opera district - Review of Hotel Panache, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Chizzamerica
title: Really good hotel in Opera district
text: I stay in Paris reasonably often on business; this was the first time at Hotel Panache. The bedroom was a very good size and the bed was super comfortable. A tasty breakfast buffet was enjoyed as well. Will definitely be heading back to this hotel when in Paris for work
